Entangle
description:
Entangle: Infrastructure for the Infinite Web3

Entangle provides a decentralized framework connecting blockchains, data, AI, and real-world applications. It enables developers to build scalable, automated systems across multiple ecosystems, supporting AI, robotics, and Real World Assets (RWA).

Key Components:

🔹 Universal Interoperability Protocol (UIP) – A fully abstracted network for seamless cross-chain communication across EVM and non-EVM ecosystems.

🔹 Universal Data Feeds (UDF) – Secure, verifiable, and fast data streams for AI, DeFi, and GameFi, bridging Web2 and Web3.

🔹 Universal Token Standard (UTS) – A framework for interoperable token creation with universal liquidity and programmable utility.

🔹 Universal Proof of Compute (UPC) – A system for verifying off-chain computations, supporting AI, DeFi, and Web3 applications.

Entangle provides the infrastructure for decentralized applications to scale, interoperate, and automate complex systems.
